Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Kidney Diseases, Cystic/Medullary Sponge Kidney
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A non-hereditary KIDNEY disorder characterized by the abnormally dilated (ECTASIA) medullary and inner papillary portions of the collecting ducts. These collecting ducts usually contain CYSTS or DIVERTICULA filled with jelly-like material or small calculi (KIDNEY STONES) leading to infections or obstruction. It should be distinguished from congenital or hereditary POLYCYSTIC KIDNEY DISEASES.
